review: A little pisses off at amazon, I bought 2 of these sticks as gifts and they were loaded with my account information, not until I seen over a $100 in charges was I aware they pre-load the stick with your amazon account information. I purchased one for my sister and mother as birthday gifts and my mother being not technically savvy  she clicked away trying to figure out how it works and ran up over $100 in charges. To top it off I ordered these as GIFTS, so why the hell are they linked to my account?
author: loosewill

review: Beware!Do not get fooled by the Fire Stick description given by Amazon.The device is NOT as described.1.Doesn't work with iOS.2. Minimal Netflix and HBOGo support.3. Despite the superior processor, streams videos slow (on a 75 MBPS connection!!)4. Listed better than Google Chromecast and Roku, but those devices could beat this at any given day.Bought this for $25 on Prime Day Fail. Wouldn't pay $5 for this!
